actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the President to appoint Captain John R. Woolley, United States Naval Reserve, Retired, to the grade of Rear Admiral on the retired list.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to appoint a certain individual to the grade of rear admiral on the retired list of the United States Naval Reserve.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President to appoint Captain John R. Woolley, United States Naval Reserve, Retired, to the grade of Rear Admiral on the retired list.
